Your tricks won't work on me!#I am a powerful sorcerer. Tell me why you're here and I might spare you!#I dunno. Magic?(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Interesting..."(break)speak {{ModId}}_Blob "Ha! I have taken down many adventurers before. You will be no different!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "NOT IF I SPARE YOU FIRST!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "Makes sense to me."/pause 300/move {{ModId}}_Sasha 2 0 2/move {{ModId}}_Sasha 0 1 2/pause 100/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "I promise you, we don't intend to attack any humans up here.#$b#My name is Sasha."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "I'm Sticky."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "I AM DEATHSKULL."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "Blob."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "And the duggy is Doug."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Doug "*Flops back and forth.*"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We came here because we wanted to find out if the legends are true."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "The ones about the Spirited Eve!#$b#Where you humans eat your pets!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "And poison each other!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "AND TRANSFORM INTO MONSTERS UNHEARD OF!"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion ...WHAT?#Transform?!#Poison?!#Eat pets?!#Do you mean 'Spirit's Eve'?(break)speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "YOU CANNOT HIDE THE TRUTH FROM US!"(break)speak {{ModId}}_Blob "You pass out small hardened poisons to weed out the weak who succumb to them!"(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "You're the reason the jack o' lanterns are going extinct!$3"(break)speak {{ModId}}_Blob "Don't put the blame on us innocent spirits!"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Whatever you have to say, we're not going home without answers.$3#$b#We're going to observe you humans until the Spirited Eve and find out the truth for ourselves!"/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "YEAH!"/pause 400/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Blob "Monsters forever!"/pause 300/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "Don't get in our way!"/pause 300/emote farmer 28/pause 300/end/fade

200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We want to get a souvenir for our friend Giant Eyeball since it couldn't come."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Subconjunctival hemorrhage.#$b#Don't worry, Dr. Plague said it should clear up in a few weeks."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "Anyway we're asking the spirits around here if they have any good ideas for souvenirs.#$b#But because a lot of them are miners they keep suggesting pretty rocks.#$b#Like we don't already have enough of those.#$b#You got any ideas?"/pause 200/quickQuestion What should they get Giant Eyeball as a souvenir?#A tasty dish from Gus.#A wooden sculpture from Leah.#A nice book from the library.#A cool sword from the Guild.#A fresh vegetable from your farm.(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "I liked the food I got last time!$1#$b#I bet it would like that too."(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "You're telling me there's a wood witch around here too?"(break)speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "IT DOES ENJOY READING.#$b#DO YOU THINK THEY HAVE ANY MYSTERY NOVELS?"(break)speak {{ModId}}_Blob "Ehh, it's more of a 'shoot lasers' kind of person than a 'swing a sword' one."(break)faceDirection {{ModId}}_Doug 2\speak {{ModId}}_Doug "*Bounces up and down excitedly.*"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We'll consider that. Thanks @!"/pause 200/speak Lewis "Hello there!"/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_Sticky 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Blob 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Deathskull 16/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/speak Lewis "I've seen you all around town, and as the mayor I just want to welcome you!#$b#I hope you've all been enjoying yourselves here."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Oh, yes fellow human!$1#$b#Your human settlement has been very nice!"/pause 400/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 40/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sasha "*Ahem*"/jump {{ModId}}_Sticky/jump {{ModId}}_Deathskull/jump {{ModId}}_Blob/pause 100/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "The human food here is very tasty!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "And this graveyard is very lively!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "AND THE HUMANS HERE ARE VERY HUMERUS!"/pause 200/speak Lewis "That's wonderful to hear!$1#$b#Please let me know if you have any concerns."/pause 200/move Lewis 8 0 0 true/pause 200/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sasha 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Is a mayor like a pharaoh?"/pause 200/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Deathskull 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Blob 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Sasha 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Sticky 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Doug 100/emote farmer 28/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_E10/e {{ModId}}_E9/z spring/z: continue/23 20/farmer 23 23 0 {{ModId}}_Blob 24 17 2 {{ModId}}_Deathskull 23 17 2 {{ModId}}_Doug 22 18 3 {{ModId}}_Sasha 23 18 0 {{ModId}}_Sticky 24 18 0/skippable/fade/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_Deathskull 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Blob 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Sticky 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 16/pause 200/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sasha 2/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sticky 2/pause 200/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Doug 2/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "@! Perfect timing.#$b#We just peeked into town and saw the most hideous sight.#$b#I wanted to keep watching but the others dragged me back here."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "We saw humans putting on skinned monsters!$2"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We couldn't recognize most of those species, but they were so grotesque we had to look away.$2"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "I THOUGHT THERE WOULD BE MORE MAGIC INVOLVED IN THE TRANSFORMATION."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "From what I've seen, humans are basically all witches.#$b#But you prefer to wear the rotting flesh of your enemies instead of just conjuring up an illusion.#$b#I'm impressed."/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/quickQuestion There seems to be some misunderstanding here...#They're not real. They're like your human disguises.#They're crafted out of regular materials, not monster flesh.#Oh yeah, those are totally slain monsters. You should be careful.#That's what the monsters in the cages are for.(break)speak {{ModId}}_Blob "I knew it! Witches!"(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "You mean like my wrappings?#$b#And my scarf?"(break)speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "THIS NEWS MAKES ME FEEL CHILLED TO THE BONE."(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "Cages? So I wasn't imagining things!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "WELL THERE'S THAT MYSTERY SOLVED.#$b#THIS SOUNDS LIKE A BREAKNECK ENDEAVOUR."/pause 200/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sasha 0/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We didn't come this far just to give up!$3#$b#We have to see this through!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "Yeah, I wanna see some poisonings!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "And the smells coming from there are so good!$1"/pause 200/jump {{ModId}}_Doug/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Doug "*Twirls around.*"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "FINE, BUT IF THINGS GET DICEY I'M PUTTING THE TOWN UNDER A CURSE AND RUNNING FOR IT."/pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 32 true/emote {{ModId}}_Sticky 20 true/emote {{ModId}}_Blob 56/pause 200/emote farmer 28/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Deathskull 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Blob 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Sasha 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Sticky 100/action AddFriendshipPoints {{ModId}}_Doug 100/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_E12/e {{ModId}}_E9/z spring/z: continue/54 6/farmer 53 7 1 {{ModId}}_Blob 55 6 3 {{ModId}}_Deathskull 56 6 3 {{ModId}}_Doug 55 8 3 {{ModId}}_Sasha 56 7 3 {{ModId}}_Sticky 56 8 3/eventSeen {{ModId}}_E11 true/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We've learned so much about your human settlement!$1"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "Like where pet jack o' lanterns come from!$1"/pause 200/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "AND HOW HUMANS TRANFORM INTO MONSTERS ONE NIGHT A YEAR!"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "I still think you're all just witches in disguise, but at least you're fun."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "Your people's food is so tasty!$1"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "WE HAD AN OSTEO-BLAST!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Doug "*Nuzzles your leg.*"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Winter is coming, so it's time for us to head home.#$b#But we'll be back next year.#$b#It'll be fun to hang around humans again!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.{{ModId}}_E11/e {{ModId}}_E1/z spring/z: continue/54 6/farmer 53 7 1 {{ModId}}_Blob 55 6 3 {{ModId}}_Deathskull 56 6 3 {{ModId}}_Doug 55 8 3 {{ModId}}_Sasha 56 7 3 {{ModId}}_Sticky 56 8 3/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Your human settlement has been very interesting to learn about."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "I met lots of mushroom friends up here!$1"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "I STILL DO NOT UNDERSTAND THE TRANSFORMATION OF HUMANS INTO MONSTERS."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Blob "And your human poisons don't seem to be very potent."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Doug "*Chews on some grass.*"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We want to stay longer, but it's getting too cold for us up here.#$b#We'll come back next year to solve the mystery of the Spirited Eve.#$b#It was nice to meet you @.$1#$b#We'll try not to attack you if we see you around."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/end/fade
